title: 在原版里在检测箱子内物品
author: 小炼金术师
txt_content: 如何在原版内检测箱子内物品（Java1.12.2）

replies.author: 迁冥DeeChael
replies.txt_content:
你把上面这两位给你说的指令结合一下就好了
Slot:箱子的栏位小箱子是0-26，大箱子是0-53
Count:数量 
ID:物品的英文id
这样总结下来就是
/testforblock [坐标] minecraft:chest -1 {Items:[{Slot:栏位,id:"物品英文id",Count:数量}]}复制代码

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2020-2-27 13:06 编辑 

/testforblock <x> <y> <z> chest -1 {Items:[{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b}]}

replies.author: 勇者之鹰
replies.txt_content: /testforblock <箱子坐标 x y z> minecraft:chest -1 {Items:[{Slot:0b,id:"minecraft:stone"}]}

replies.author: 凋灵斯拉
replies.txt_content: 用观察者对着箱子即可

replies.author: 小炼金术师
replies.txt_content: 为神魔我提示说没有nbt标签
